meanings.definition: The warmest season of the year, in the northern hemisphere from June to August and in the southern hemisphere from December to February.
meanings.sent1: During the summers, we enjoy picnics in the park.
meanings.sent2: I love swimming in the pool during the summers.
meanings.sent3: The ice cream melted quickly in the hot summers.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the air like the warmth of summers.
meanings.sent5: The summers bring vibrant flowers and long days.

meanings.definition: To spend the summer in a particular place or way.
meanings.sent1: We summers at the beach every year.
meanings.sent2: They summers in the mountains for hiking.
meanings.sent3: He summers by sleeping in till noon every day.
meanings.sent4: She summers like a lazy cat in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The family summers by exploring new cities together.

meanings.definition: The period of time between the end of one school year and the beginning of the next.
meanings.sent1: During the summers, kids enjoy their break from school.
meanings.sent2: The summers always seem too short for all the fun we want to have.
meanings.sent3: The summers felt like they flew by in a blink.
meanings.sent4: In the summers, time seems to slow down for students.
meanings.sent5: The summers are a time for relaxation and adventure.
